ai-thag6.5:1.2_0: craving increases like a clinging creeper,
ai-thag6.5:1.3_0: They jump from life to life, like a monkey
ai-thag6.5:1.4_0: greedy for fruit in a forest grove.
ai-thag6.5:2.1_0: Whoever is beaten by this wretched craving,
ai-thag6.5:3.1_0: But whoever prevails over this wretched craving,
ai-thag6.5:3.2_0: so hard to get over in the world,
ai-thag6.5:3.4_0: like a drop from a lotus-leaf.
ai-thag6.5:4.1_0: I say this to you, good people,
ai-thag6.5:4.3_0: dig up the root of craving,
ai-thag6.5:4.4_0: as you’d dig up the grass in search of roots.
ai-thag6.5:4.5_0: Don’t let Māra break you again and again,
ai-thag6.5:4.6_0: like a stream breaking a reed.
ai-thag6.5:5.2_0: don’t let the moment pass you by.
ai-thag6.5:5.3_0: For if you miss your moment,
ai-thag6.5:5.4_0: you’ll grieve when sent to hell.
